entry.string: Your server does unfortunately not have the image library "GD" installed, so Photoshare cannot be installed. Please contact your web administrator in order to get GD installed.
entry.translation: Yuoor serfer dues unffurtoonetely nut hefe-a zee imege-a leebrery "GD" instelled, su Phutushere-a cunnut be-a instelled. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a cuntect yuoor veb edmeenistretur in oorder tu get GD instelled.
